title: 😍🏡Love Where You Live at The Arts at South Austin😍🏡
posting_body: The Arts at South Austin has the perfect apartment in a quiet neighborhood that will make you feel right at home!
We have a beautiful premier 2 Bed 1.5 bath Townhome available as soon as September 15th !
Today the pricing for a lease start date of 09/15/22 and a lease term of 13 months the price is $1777
*Pricing and availability change daily and are dependent on lease term and lease start date.
Call for the most up to date prices.
*Open Back Patio out from the Living Room
In our Community, you will find
*Resort-style Pool with Plenty of Lounge Chairs and Tables as well as a BBQ section
*BBQ Grills and Picnic Tables throughout the community
*Amazing Dog Park Perfect for your Furry Friends!
We are conveniently located in between South Congress and First Street.
Our perfect south central location keeps resident close to everything Austin has to offer.
Be close to downtown without the downtown prices!
ALL PICTURES SHOWN ARE FOR ILLUSTRATION PURPOSE ONLY.
MAY VARY DUE TO PRODUCT ENHANCEMENT.
Call us today to tour your new home or just stop on by and ask about apartment #324!
Ask for Arianna and mention you found us on Craigslist!
Make a home in a community with a touch of art!
